org.descripter.js.api

Class Script<W extends Script<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.descripter.js.api.Context<Key,java.lang.Object,W>
      • org.descripter.js.api.Objective<W>
        • org.descripter.js.api.Script<W>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cases, For, Functor, Global, Script.MyScript, Scriptlet, Visitor, With

    public abstract class Script<W extends Script<?>>
extends Objective<W>
implements java.lang.Runnable

    Emulates script contexts of JavaScript codes.

    Since:
    Descripter 1.0
    Author:
    J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.descripter.org

      An abstract base class of Function without generic types.
      static class  Script.MyFunctor
      An abstract base class of Functor without generic types.
      static class  Script.MyScript
      An abstract base class for Script contexts without generic types.
